column4: cittadino, you can do it with squid proxy; but i'm not really familiar with it to give instructions
cittadino: yeah wireshark would be MUCH easier lol
cittadino: that would probably be easiest. it's possible to set up a real internal proxy server via squid (connects between the host and switch/router) that does full logs, but that's quite a hassle
but i'd just get web connections in that case, correct me if im wrong
